Uses of Interface
jakarta.nosql.document.DocumentCollectionManagerAsync

  • Packages that use DocumentCollectionManagerAsync 
    Package Description
    jakarta.nosql.document
    This package contains all objects to use a Document Collection.
    jakarta.nosql.mapping.document
    This package contains all objects to use a Document Collection.

    • Uses of DocumentCollectionManagerAsync in jakarta.nosql.document

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      T      		 DocumentCollectionManagerAsyncFactory.getAsync(String database)
      Creates a DocumentCollectionManagerAsync from database's name
      Methods in jakarta.nosql.document with parameters of type DocumentCollectionManagerAsync 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void DocumentDeleteQuery.DocumentDeleteQueryBuild.delete(DocumentCollectionManagerAsync manager)
      executes the delete(DocumentDeleteQuery)
      void DocumentDeleteQuery.DocumentDeleteQueryBuild.delete(DocumentCollectionManagerAsync manager, Consumer<Void> callback)
      executes the delete(DocumentDeleteQuery, Consumer)
      void DocumentQuery.DocumentQueryBuild.getResult(DocumentCollectionManagerAsync manager, Consumer<Stream<DocumentEntity>> callback)
      Executes select(DocumentQuery, Consumer)
      void DocumentQuery.DocumentQueryBuild.getSingleResult(DocumentCollectionManagerAsync manager, Consumer<Optional<DocumentEntity>> callback)
      Executes singleResult(DocumentQuery, Consumer)
      DocumentPreparedStatementAsync DocumentQueryParserAsync.prepare(String query, DocumentCollectionManagerAsync collectionManager, DocumentObserverParser observer)
      Executes a query and returns a DocumentPreparedStatementAsync, when the operations are insert, update and select command it will return the result of the operation when the command is delete it will return an empty collection.
      void DocumentQueryParserAsync.query(String query, DocumentCollectionManagerAsync collectionManager, Consumer<Stream<DocumentEntity>> callBack, DocumentObserverParser observer)
      Executes a query and returns the result, when the operations are insert, update and select command it will return the result of the operation when the command is delete it will return an empty collection.
